Description:

    Spec Ops: The Line - an unusual cinematic third-person shooter that will make you enter into a confrontation not only with real opponents, but even with their own principles. Get ready to be in a world where there is no place the concept of "morality" and at every step we have to choose - who will live and who will die. Dubai has been wiped off the face of the Earth horrifying cataclysm. The unprecedented dust storm turned the once magnificent city in ruins. And now you in the role of captain of Delta Force detachment Martin Walker will have to go to the abandoned territory to find and return home of Colonel John Konrad. Take part in special operations and fight opponents who are not afraid of death. To survive and succeed, will have to use different tactics of warfare, a variety of authentic military bestgeymer no equipment and landscape features. Unique Dynamic Sand will you and reliable ally and an insidious enemy. Sand does not care who is right and who is wrong - a lucky shot could bring down the weight of silicon on the heads of your enemies, but the same thing could happen to you. Spec Ops: The Line combines an exciting storyline campaign and thrilling multiplayer with a variety of competitive and cooperative modes. You will be able to join in the conflict on the side of one of the two factions, and prove their superiority against the backdrop of beautiful and terrifying at the same time ruined landscapes of Dubai
